pt.title: Mestres de Cena: Novos Horizontes
pt.description: Série de palestras com grandes nomes do teatro nacional e internacional.
pt.fullDescription: A série "Mestres de Cena: Novos Horizontes" apresenta uma tarde de palestras e debates com grandes nomes do teatro nacional e internacional. Este evento gratuito oferece uma oportunidade única de aprender com profissionais renomados e descobrir novas perspectivas sobre as artes cênicas contemporâneas.

en.title: Stage Masters: New Horizons
en.description: Lecture series with great names from national and international theater.
en.fullDescription: The "Stage Masters: New Horizons" series presents an afternoon of lectures and debates with great names from national and international theater. This free event offers a unique opportunity to learn from renowned professionals and discover new perspectives on contemporary performing arts.
